text:
[Verse]
Walking through the alley night
Neon lights begin to rise
Footsteps echo city life
Shadows dance under the sky

[Verse 2]
Graffiti whispers tales untold
Every wall a story bold
Whistle of the midnight breeze
Lost in urban symphony

[Chorus]
Whoa oh oh feel the city buzz
Whoa oh oh hear the heartbeat thump
Raise a glass to nights alive
In the city where dreams thrive

[Verse 3]
Pavement cracks and unseen dreams
Streetlights cast their hopeful gleam
Every corner has a secret song
Echoes in the city long

[Chorus]
Whoa oh oh feel the city buzz
Whoa oh oh hear the heartbeat thump
Raise a glass to nights alive
In the city where dreams thrive

[Bridge]
Skyline paints a canvas high
Stars reflect in sleepless eyes
Silent promises abound
In the city's endless sound
title: Echoes of the City
